snippet.title: Reach:SOS - Demo Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The demo of Reach: SOS, a point-and-click puzzle adventure game where players take on the role of Shadow, a deeply lonely and isolated outpost worker that starts receiving cryptic messages, is now available on Google Play! 

Play the demo for free on Google Play : https://bit.ly/ReachGooglePlay
or on the Apple App Store: https://bit.ly/ReachAppStore

And follow us on twitter for updates on the full game: https://twitter.com/Reach_TheGame
